title: What are some examples of anthropological? - Quora

response.answer_text: Here is one example. I work in Public Health, and use my cultural anthropology training constantly. In Ghana, I led a project which interviewed hundreds of people regarding their knowledge, attitudes, and beliefs about fertility and contraception. In the anthropological approach, we study not only the individuals, but also the way that individuals interact with others in their families, their groups, and their societies. We also interviewed traditional healers, traditional rulers, traditional priests, and others regarding their views and advice to others about planning a family and using contraceptives. Using the understanding we gained, we developed a family planning assistance program with the government which provided contraceptive counseling and services in a culturally appropriate manner. Prevalence of contraceptive use more than doubled within a year.
